sentences.sContent: Car, although the black bear still mean not apprehensible, the rabbit still kept getting hold of a motorcycle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Car, although the black bear still mean not apprehensible, the rabbit still kept getting hold of a motorcycle.
sentences.sCn: 车，虽然狗熊仍然表示不可理解，但是兔子还是拿到了摩托车。

trans.tranCn: 可了解的， 可理解的
trans.tranOther: capable of being comprehended or grasped mentally
